channel.title: Single Sign-On (SSO) :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Single Sign-On (SSO) at Okta Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: New IAM Developers,Developers new to Okta Description: Answers “What is SSO?”, how it differs from a basic sign in, and “How Okta supports it”. Also “How does a user experience SSO from the Okta End User Dashboard or from another place?” Note SSO is a generic industry concept, but Okta SSO is a product, compare with SLO, UL and introduce the concept of SSO integrations in OIN, but more as a link to the Learn > OIN > OIn Integrations page.
